item.description:
Those of you who came to see Gale B. Gardiner at Cugino's in Cheshire this past October know what a lovely cozy, unique atmosphere it offers. On this day, come unwind after your busy Thanksgiving and share stories with your friends over some yummy Italian food....All the while being soothed and awed by Gale's talented piano playing!

There is no cover for this event, but Gale is playing music for dining guests, so it will meant a lot to her and to the venue of you purchase a meal. For more info on the menu or prices, let me know. The fare is Northen Italian, Homestyle, and quite good!
item.name: Piano Dinner for Friends!
